name: Exploring the depths-ld48
description:
Earth is rapidly freezing. Years prior, you predicted this event would happen and made a submarine just for a situation like this. Now, it's time to use it and explore the depths in search of somewhere to live, but be careful as you are not alone down there.

HOW TO PLAY:

Sorry, like an idiot I explained the UI but not the controls.

Mouse - Direction

Left Shift - Accelerate(release to decelerate)

Creative designer: Southside_Phantom
